attributes.action: Break all ties and stop all AID to Pakistan until Minorities are protected
attributes.additional_details:
Break ties with Pakistan and stop all aid until Pakistan stops using religious persecution and rapes and forced conversions of minorities.

The Minority population has been dwindling in Pakistan due to inaction on the western government.  For all the high hopes and our Countries stand for Human rights.  The Human rights are being violated on a daily basis and ethnic cleansing via forced conversion of Hindus, Sikh and Christians.

The Government needs to stop relationships with Pakistan and stop Aid to help raise awareness of these atrocities.
